item.title: Upcoming Training on Modern .NET with Vertical Slice Architecture in Frankfurt
item.description: It's training time again! I've got another training event coming up focusing on Modern .NET with Vertical Slice Architecture in Frankfurt on June 25th-26th.Also similar to last year's edition of the course is an option for either a 2-day or 3-day version. The Link to article: https://www.jimmybogard.com/upcoming-training-on-modern-net-with-vertical-slice-architecture-in-frankfurt/
